Create Multi-Variable Scatter Plot Matrix

Source: R/wp_plot_scatter.r
in_plot_scatter_multi_vars.Rd

Internal function that creates a matrix of scatter plots for multiple variables. Handles panel creation, consistent formatting, and optional common variable plotting. Core implementation for complex scatter plot matrices.

Used by: wp_plot_scatter (via in_plot_core) Uses: in_plot_scatter_two_vars

Features:

  • Matrix layout of scatter plots

  • Common variable option (one variable vs all others)

  • Consistent styling across panels

  • Optional panel titles

  • Legend sharing across panels

Usage

in_plot_scatter_multi_vars(
  data,
  variables = NULL,
  common_var = TRUE,
  color = NULL,
  ISO = NULL,
  interpolation = NULL,
  spline_bw = NULL,
  r_squared = FALSE,
  label_nudge = 0.05,
  highlight_zero = TRUE,
  x_axis = NULL,
  y_axis = NULL,
  subfig_title = FALSE,
  size = 1,
  base_size = 11,
  print = TRUE,
  verbose = TRUE,
  debug = FALSE
)

Developed by Benjamin Peeters.
